item.title: Add Patient Profile
item.description: In the Home panel, select the patient Add button. The Patient Information dialog box opens. Enter a first and last name. Select one of the following: OD – right eye OS – left eye To add a date of birth, patient ID name, or procedure, click Optional Data. a. In the Date of Birth field, enter a year, month, and day. b. In the ID field, enter a unique identification code.
